1b1(myang 'das): rlug skad du/ bany+dza jug te smra sroka d+hA ram
1b2(myang 'das): bod spyad du// sa rab kyi rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dus
1b3(myang 'das): ngo po// bam po thog ma// sangs rgyas dang byeng
2a1(myang 'das): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
2a2(myang 'das): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcoM mu ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi rib rgyud 'phungs
2a3(myang 'das): pa la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thob so cig ste/ zam
2a4(myang 'das): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon monges pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/
2b1(myang 'das): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas
2b2(myang 'das): pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka'
2b3(myang 'das): yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa
2b4(myang 'das): sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// dge/
2b5(myang 'das): slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
3a1(myang 'das): #/ shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med
3a2(myang 'das): pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod
3a3(myang 'das): yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med
3a4(myang 'das): pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ zegs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul
3a5(myang 'das): khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang /
3a6(myang 'das): ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grag
3b1(myang 'das): pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thong pa/
3b2(myang 'das): yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/
3b3(myang 'das): pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mangs
3b4(myang 'das): pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol
3b5(myang 'das): la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ zlum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs po michod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gdon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang
3b6(myang 'das): ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bsnun pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rngu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang
3b7(myang 'das): mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad
4a1(myang 'das): kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa pa dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa spyod du chud par byabalas khas bya/ sems na thams cad la ldang med pa'i sems
4a2(myang 'das): dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che deng ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la ma khas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang rngan pas gting dngag dka' ba/ rang
4a3(myang 'das): gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan/
4a4(myang 'das): pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lnga ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad/
4a5(myang 'das): spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu
4a6(myang 'das): rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa
4a7(myang 'das): rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/
4b1(myang 'das): das po rdza pa/ ngas rgyas byung ba thams par du ra 'grob lam rnam / sangs rgyas dpa ga med pa la gsol ga shA sa smra/ trA~M
4b2(myang 'das): tshogs kyi chos yongs su bskyed pa'i tshon mongs pazhi bar bya ba lam bas pa/ ting nge 'dzin pa rgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par bye ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yon
4b3(myang 'das): brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bzang stong dang / rin ninu 'byung gnas dang /
4b4(myang 'das): chen snying po dang / rin chen byin pa dang / ded dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / stob skyed dang / chu bdag lnga dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros da
4b5(myang 'das): ba dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med blo gros dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthungs pas rnam/
4b6(myang 'das): par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong bar brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros
4b7(myang 'das): dpe med pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang /
5a1(myang 'das): lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brgyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyun chen po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ri bro'i zom dang /
5a2(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
5a3(myang 'das): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por srang ste dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der
5a4(myang 'das): bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la/
5a5(myang 'das): mnyam par gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di
5a6(myang 'das): larnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas rgya thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkyiste/ rol 'bas kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo no bas spyong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer du ba rtsag
5a7(myang 'das): zhen rgya tshang chub sas kyis mo brgyams par 'ang zer gyi khrag khrig stong dru dru chung // kyiyang byas meng / rtsom pas
5b1(myang 'das): ma / dang / rgyus nga/ 'al / phywas
5b2(myang 'das): thams pa 'ong bar bye zug zis pam stong drug tu drag byung ngo // khrus gsor so bsnga' sa kyang 'od par bye ga cig pas stong dag ga rudung // du ga
5b3(myang 'das): gnyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur dang / choms mche ba bzhi dang / tshems pa'i bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / sman gaunyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis pa
5b4(myang 'das): smin mtshams kyi mdzod sgra dang / ljang gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgonas kyang 'od bar bye ba zag khrig brgya stong drug na drug du byung ste/ 'od byer bye ba khrag khrig pam stong drug tsa dro
5b5(myang 'das): dag thams cad kyis/ snying gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+h+r-i'i glangs kyi
5b6(myang 'das): mu s+t+rai snang ba chen pos kyang par byas so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / ljon pa dang / nub byung gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'ad
5b7(myang 'das): steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer des gang la reg
6a1(myang 'das): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba sgyu'i
6a2(myang 'das): sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu 'gye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sher phyogs su 'jog
6a3(myang 'das): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs
6a4(myang 'das): mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba
6a5(myang 'das): dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
6a6(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis/ song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sdang bachen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'dzidzin gyi khams gan+d+ha
6a7(myang 'das): rlung gi byem med snang bachen pos khyab par mdzang ngo // lha dang / rub dang / byang dang / bya bar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nung byang gi phyogs ma tshams dang / 'og
6b1(myang 'das): ga phyogs su bas sa kyi sa sa kyis skyed nga ba na pos rgya par ya po// sasu gang sa du spyod dang / 'od sgyu bya ba /
6b2(myang 'das): pade dag thams cad kyang / rgyun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas par gyur to/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis gal gyi gonas ljags kyi da yo
6b3(myang 'das): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad ldag kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas rgal 'dzum pa mdzad do// lcags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer la dog
6b4(myang 'das): tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum 'dzin te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad lwa pradro mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna rigs
6b5(myang 'das): su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+di ka lhar reg na bde bar gyur pa sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/
6b6(myang 'das): pad+mo de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi
6b7(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis ches ston to// de dag
7a1(myang 'das): lho dang / nub dang / byung dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / rlung byung gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogasas
7a2(myang 'das): phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid
7a3(myang 'das): kyis chos ston to// sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de
7a4(myang 'das): nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rdzu 'drul mngon/
7a5(myang 'das): par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos
7a6(myang 'das): so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg gi/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem
7a7(myang 'das): chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/ dbus mthon na mtha'
7b1(myang 'das): dma' ste/ ngal dus bags kyi sa nyams su ba bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang byed bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cigasung nam tha byig /
7b2(myang 'das): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mkhom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan
7b3(myang 'das): 'gro dang / log par ltung ba ga ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//
7b4(myang 'das): de bzhin du rgyal chen poni'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes
7b5(myang 'das): par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te// rjes su dran nas dga' ba da /
7b6(myang 'das): mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
7b7(myang 'das): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
8a1(myang 'das): byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
8a2(myang 'das): dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de
8a3(myang 'das): dag thams cad kyang mi dang lngar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran
8a4(myang 'das): par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
8a5(myang 'das): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
8a6(myang 'das): de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
8a7(myang 'das): cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang
8b1(myang 'das): 'jug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// dkres pa rnams kyang bas thob par
8b2(myang 'das): gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po rang
8b3(myang 'das): 'ang rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur te// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang / ngag dang
8b4(myang 'das): yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na pa dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang /
8b5(myang 'das): gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa
8b6(myang 'das): dang / btsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper
8b7(myang 'das): na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan
9a1(myang 'das): d+d+ha rmA/ TIn pa dge s+ho// dul ga / dgas/ rnam pa'i / smra
9a2(myang 'das): byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rjeni dge ba'o// tshungs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge 'o// srog na gsas suchu pa bams cad lnga mi 'tshe ba 'din dger 'o sa du shes par gyur
9a3(myang 'das): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper ni nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa
9a4(myang 'das): 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i granas dang bcas pa/ dbang
9a5(myang 'das): po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs
9a6(myang 'das): na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ ljang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sdong gsum gyi steng chen po'i
9a7(myang 'das): 'dzag rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/
9b1(myang 'das): shA phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gang+gA'i klung kyi byem med kyil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / spyan dog dang / ga'i brjid du/ rAngul kyis mdas kyi
9b2(myang 'das): sbyin no// byung dar bzhugs so// b+h+yo dang / na dang / byung dang / shar dang / ra spyong / wAn pa dang / nu byung gi phyogs marnam sna dang //
9b3(myang 'das): phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis smanan te/ 'od dang / sum drug dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lha mo
9b4(myang 'das): ldan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste/ dbyer na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni/ ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ ldan na
9b5(myang 'das): ljang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ ljang nge'o// 'di lta ste/
9b6(myang 'das): dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhung nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i
9b7(myang 'das): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang /
10a1(myang 'das): 'i brjid dang / dpal gyis ma dzes shing rnam sa/ na/ da dog/ nas sma ts+tshas na 'as rgyas rkyo gsas kyi
10a2(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gas
10a3(myang 'das): kyi lha'i ris dang / kun sdang drang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtsho ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsumu dang / rgyal/
10a4(myang 'das): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas dgra'
10a5(myang 'das): zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
10a6(myang 'das): byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na lin dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta mA la'i lo ma dang /
10a7(myang 'das): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas me tog dang / 'breng /
10b1(myang 'das): sa da / byug+sa pa dang / seM s+yA nga / 'dug thos dang / At+pa la dang / rjo / gas dang / kA h+ma/ sbyid dang/ saud+hakA r+b+hA d+hA/
10b2(myang 'das): ra dang / ta ma la'i la mi dang / rdzas kyi na dbu'adang / rgyun drung / gladags dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lhardzas kyi byu drug gis bcom ldan 'das la gtu to//
10b3(myang 'das): gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / me tog tshulas skyes pa dang /
10b4(myang 'das): zang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin cing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur te// me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / smyos dang /
10b5(myang 'das): pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
10b6(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to// khang /
10b7(myang 'das): pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang ngar gyi lnga ldi dag
11a1(myang 'das): \u0f7f/ gis stong gsum kyi stong chen po 'i 'ag rten gyi lam sa shin d+ha ngas par gyur to// ldan 'das kyi khyod kyang bag smra kyi 'du rgyu
11a2(myang 'das): shin tu mdzes shing lham me/ ldanan/ lhang nger gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams 'dir rje lta bde bzhin du/ gar phyogs kyi 'dig rten gyi
11a3(myang 'das): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od sdang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// dang / rub dang / nga dang / byung shar dang / shar yod du/
11a4(myang 'das): nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od sdang /
11a5(myang 'das): ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
11a6(myang 'das): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi bu glang spyod dang /
11a7(myang 'das): shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen ba'i'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
11b1(myang 'das): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / gleng gsum mi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ma thams dang / thams pad kyis de pazhi gshegs pa'i gru brtsubar rog smra
11b2(myang 'das): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos sbyin to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
11b3(myang 'das): gdan seng go'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu 'gye ba mdzad de/ yang 'ong des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur // shar rdzogs
11b4(myang 'das): dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shur lho dang / lho nub dang / rub byung gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gri phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jigs rten
11b5(myang 'das): gyi khams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/
11b6(myang 'das): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
11b7(myang 'das): 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyis lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang /
12a1(myang 'das): shar lho dang / lho rub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
12a2(myang 'das): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo // shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ sems/
12a3(myang 'das): can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
12a4(myang 'das): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang
12a5(myang 'das): byung dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
12a6(myang 'das): snyid po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
12a7(myang 'das): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//
12b1(myang 'das): denas par phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams parda klung gi rtse ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi rol na/ 'jig rgyun gyi rnams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba'od/ rlung nga/
12b2(myang 'das): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ron sbyin 'byung gnas shes bya bya ba zugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
12b3(myang 'das): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od der kun nas 'byung ba zhis bya
12b4(myang 'das): ba 'dug 'dug pas/ sdang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i su blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de ba'in gshegs par dra/
12b5(myang 'das): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces
12b6(myang 'das): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyer/
12b7(myang 'das): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces
13a1(myang 'das): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya
13a2(myang 'das): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13a3(myang 'das): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
13a4(myang 'das): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom
13a5(myang 'das): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
13a6(myang 'das): dnga'achen po de dag kun kyang bral cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bgrub pa rab tu thong pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyems par 'jug pa thams cad la dang
13a7(myang 'das): rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mara'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhir gshegs pa rin cher 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar do'i dus la bab par shes ma
13b1(myang 'das): ma sa gshegs pa chen 'byung gnas kyi sa/ rgyung chus sems dpar sems du la 'du su su d+hA la/ sa
13b2(myang 'das): byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab pa stong dang ldar pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa nas ba drub pa
13b3(myang 'das): dril/ bcom ldan 'das spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pidrogs pa
13b4(myang 'das): gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'dasal mchod pa'i slad du bskur
13b5(myang 'das): zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
13b6(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur tA re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od
13b7(myang 'das): zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad+mo gser gyi
14a1(myang 'das): mdog can 'dabam stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpal khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa rgya
14a2(myang 'das): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag
14a3(myang 'das): thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim
14a4(myang 'das): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das
14a5(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
14a6(myang 'das): gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ong bar kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'dasA la 'di skad ces gsol to//
14a7(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis
14b1(myang 'das): sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan
14b2(myang 'das): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo
14b3(myang 'das): dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gapar bdud
14b4(myang 'das): gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i su mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar ba ro/
14b5(myang 'das): tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stor to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
14b6(myang 'das): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
14b7(myang 'das): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig
15a1(myang 'das): tu 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med
15a2(myang 'das): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
15a3(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med
15a4(myang 'das): pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta mchog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
15a5(myang 'das): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'dri
15a6(myang 'das): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i
15a7(myang 'das): rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di
15b1(myang 'das): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/
15b2(myang 'das): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe myong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
15b3(myang 'das): chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
15b4(myang 'das): gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
15b5(myang 'das): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
15b6(myang 'das): gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyems par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du
15b7(myang 'das): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med po'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngo'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
16a1(myang 'das): pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog
16a2(myang 'das): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da la/ bcom ldan
16a3(myang 'das): 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
16a4(myang 'das): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis
16a5(myang 'das): gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
16a6(myang 'das): mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
16a7(myang 'das): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba
16b1(myang 'das): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dung 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
16b2(myang 'das): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / thos dang / bdug thos dang / 'phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang
16b3(myang 'das): rkyen dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdza
16b4(myang 'das): 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der do
16b5(myang 'das): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya
16b6(myang 'das): ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal
16b7(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyong ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi
17a1(myang 'das): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
17a2(myang 'das): pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes ras/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de
17a3(myang 'das): ngag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin
17a4(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de dag sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
17a5(myang 'das): thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su
17a6(myang 'das): 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/
17a7(myang 'das): bkur stir byas so// bsti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
17b1(myang 'das): bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro 'am
17b2(myang 'das): bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi 'dun
17b3(myang 'das): den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog
17b4(myang 'das): mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cher 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
17b5(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
17b6(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
17b7(myang 'das): pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
18a1(myang 'das): mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub
18a2(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin teng 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis
18a3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
18a4(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs/
18a5(myang 'das): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18a6(myang 'das): gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhing / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa'
18a7(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po stong ba'i blo gros la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18b1(myang 'das): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang /
18b2(myang 'das): ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'bros
18b3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
18b4(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur tA re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
18b5(myang 'das): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
18b6(myang 'das): dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas
18b7(myang 'das): kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang
19a1(myang 'das): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir/
19a2(myang 'das): bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
19a3(myang 'das): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
19a4(myang 'das): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
19a5(myang 'das): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
19a6(myang 'das): bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom
19a7(myang 'das): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ rub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pode
19b1(myang 'das): ngag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par bya
19b2(myang 'das): par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos pa
19b3(myang 'das): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su
19b4(myang 'das): 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir
19b5(myang 'das): byas so// bsti sdang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi/
19b6(myang 'das): pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing
19b7(myang 'das): skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa'
20a1(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byim zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ba ltar chog myi shes pa de/
20a2(myang 'das): mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
20a3(myang 'das): pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di
20a4(myang 'das): bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
20a5(myang 'das): byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba
20a6(myang 'das): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe myong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20a7(myang 'das): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de ba'i/
20b1(myang 'das): gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dang
20b2(myang 'das): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pade blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang bal cheraru gzhon nur
20b3(myang 'das): gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom
20b4(myang 'das): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na seng zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang
20b5(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad+mo ri po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom
20b6(myang 'das): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde
20b7(myang 'das): 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
21a1(myang 'das): rgyal bu'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/
21a2(myang 'das): bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/
21a3(myang 'das): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las//
21a4(myang 'das): pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig/
21a5(myang 'das): brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams
21a6(myang 'das): cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun dag gis rim
21a7(myang 'das): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom
21b1(myang 'das): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gdun pa der song ste sbyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
21b2(myang 'das): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
21b3(myang 'das): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/ bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde
