110b6(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o//
110b7(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dam pa'o//
111a1(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab bo// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phul lo// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog go// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gya nom pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
111a2(myang 'das): bzang po'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lhag na ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
111a3(myang 'das): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' 'o// bcom ldan 'das
111a4(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
111a5(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid sto
111a6(myang 'das): banyid do// stsos sa byung chub sa sa pa na po sa kyi phyin pa 'din ma la tham myos su tshugs / sa na das dang mam
111a7(myang 'das): mas kyi la byed pa 'dzidi yo mas cad pa ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'as / shes rab kyi yo byon pa 'di byang chub me dzes dpa' semams
111b1(myang 'das): rnams kyi rol tu phyin pagrub pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rjod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams kyis rnams mas
111b2(myang 'das): dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang ngo // yongs su gtong ngo // yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// de'i snang du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
111b3(myang 'das): gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i spyang du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thong bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mim
111b4(myang 'das): pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111b5(myang 'das): 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so// srung ngo // bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du
111b6(myang 'das): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i skad du mi mnyam pa dang
111b7(myang 'das): mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
112a1(myang 'das): gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu smin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas
112a2(myang 'das): kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so// sgom mo// bsgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
112a3(myang 'das): par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du
112a4(myang 'das): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
112a5(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so// rtsom mo// rtsom par 'gyur ro// de'i
112a6(myang 'das): slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa/
112a7(myang 'das): dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur
112b1(myang 'das): to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' dren po rnams kyis mi ma 'am pa dang /
112b2(myang 'das): mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do// skyed do// bskyed par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na
112b3(myang 'das): yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slang du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slang du myi mnyam pa
112b4(myang 'das): dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
112b5(myang 'das): phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so// sgom mo// bsgom par 'gyur
112b6(myang 'das): ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam
112b7(myang 'das): pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/
113a1(myang 'das): thob par gyur to// thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyod pas mi mnyam
113a2(myang 'das): pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyas par gyur to// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par
113a3(myang 'das): gyur to// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
113a4(myang 'das): rnams dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mi mnyam
113a5(myang 'das): pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
113a6(myang 'das): pa brnyes par gyur to// brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas mi mnyam pa deng mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
113a7(myang 'das): bar gyur to// nor ro// bskor bar 'gyur ro// de lha lags pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas
113b1(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni /
113b2(myang 'das): bi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba legs so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang
113b3(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no//
113b4(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// de ci'i
113b5(myang 'das): phyir nar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na mo'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// b+ha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing
113b6(myang 'das): mtho ba'i rigs dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang
113b7(myang 'das): sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs rgyanyi pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang
114a1(myang 'das): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dag
114a2(myang 'das): rgyus dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang / 'og
114a3(myang 'das): min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig/
114a4(myang 'das): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du
114a5(myang 'das): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang // mal rgyu dang / khyi mag
114a6(myang 'das): mtshob dang / nor dru dang / rmA d+h+r-ig dang / drung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngum ngag kyang 'dzag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi 'dus rnam
114a7(myang 'das): ya sa pa ma ba pa byang chu ma mas dpa' mams sa chen
114b1(myang 'das): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bdag byang chub sems dpa' di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ga
114b2(myang 'das): bdag sbyin pa yongs su gting zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro// bdag tshul khrims srung zhing gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro// bdag bzod pa sgo ra zhing gzhan yang brjod pa la sbyor na/
114b3(myang 'das): bdag brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro// bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro// bdag shes rab skom zhing gzhan yang shes rab ma
114b4(myang 'das): pa la sbyor ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten cing / sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas 'jig rten pa
114b5(myang 'das): rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs
114b6(myang 'das): pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkrab ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do// de nas
114b7(myang 'das): de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po las 'od 'phro ba kha dog dum dang / kha dog sna tshigs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to// de bung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams garda'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang /
115a1(myang 'das): nga chen pos rgyas par gyur to// lho dang / nung dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
115a2(myang 'das): kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi
115a3(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
115a4(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag sdang ba chen po bltams pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
115a5(myang 'das): 'di ni nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des
115a6(myang 'das): zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di/
115a7(myang 'das): dag sdang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol 'phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re ro'i bar du 'jig rte gyi
115b1(myang 'das): sa myi me pa 'a saju ma pas rgya des nga rgyu ma pa'i sems sa sa sa
115b2(myang 'das): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das desngalags / bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sa su rgyas shA tu pa
115b3(myang 'das): de la phyag bgyi pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcunas 'dus pa de dag kyang ba lta ba dang / shes rab kyi rol tu phyi par sa
115b4(myang 'das): sdud du mchi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na deng zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' srams dpa' chen po dngas
115b5(myang 'das): gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ la bdun du g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/ phyogs
115b6(myang 'das): bcu nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / me tog dang / 'greng ba dang / spros dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang
115b7(myang 'das): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba ngan rnam pa sna tshogs khyer te/ glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba mang pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
116a1(myang 'das): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
116a2(myang 'das): mdzem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs ldan pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang

116a6(myang 'das): ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
116a7(myang 'das): pa gang na ba der dong ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha de dag gis me tog dang / 'breng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang /
116b1(myang 'das): ma dang / nabaka' drung gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ngadan de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
116b2(myang 'das): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i hUM gi nam mkha' la mngon
116b3(myang 'das): par 'phags te/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zla ba ni ka bya ba ni dang ldan pa/ cha kun tu mnyam pa shin tu rnam par bye ba/ mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar reg rje 'dug go/
116b4(myang 'das): de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsor to//
116b5(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu tha
116b6(myang 'das): cad thob par gyur te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o// da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos
116b7(myang 'das): bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/ chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
117a1(myang 'das): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga'
117a2(myang 'das): bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud de
117a3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis rnal
117a4(myang 'das): 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
117a5(myang 'das): de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/ bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
117a6(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ shA ri'i
117a7(myang 'das): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems
117b1(myang 'das): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'byung bar
117b2(myang 'das): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag nga
117b3(myang 'das): lnga'i bu de dag 'di snyam ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang / shugs kyi go chas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/
117b4(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/ 'on tam sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
117b5(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
117b6(myang 'das): ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci spu yang rung / gang ci rton kyang rung / gang ci brjod kyang rung
117b7(myang 'das): de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo// de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa
118a1(myang 'das): de la slob cing / chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
118a2(myang 'das): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/ nyan thos
118a3(myang 'das): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
118a4(myang 'das): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/
118a5(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar
118a6(myang 'das): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
118a7(myang 'das): chen po ni su zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang

132b3(myang 'das): gi ming dang mtshan nyid la yang chags par 'gyur ba med do// byang chub sems dpa'i lus la yang chags par 'gyur ba med do// shA'i mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do// lha'i
132b4(myang 'das): mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do// mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do//
132b5(myang 'das): nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// phyi stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// byi nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la/
132b6(myang 'das): chags par 'gyur ba med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
132b7(myang 'das): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
133a1(myang 'das): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a
133a2(myang 'das): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // mngon par shes pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
133a3(myang 'das): chags par 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
133a4(myang 'das): rgyas kyi chos ma dris pa bcwo brgyad la chags par 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la chags par 'gyur ba med do// chos kyi dbyings la chags
133a5(myang 'das): par 'gyur ba med do// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do// thabs ma pas
133a6(myang 'das): pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang chags par byed pa 'am/ gang gis chags par bya ba'am/ gang la chags par bya ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad med
133a7(myang 'das): nga'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// tshul khrims kyi phachom
133b1(myang 'das): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par phel mo//
133b2(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro// phyir mo ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
133b3(myang 'das): mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang // sems can yongs su smin par byed cing // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /
133b4(myang 'das): bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
133b5(myang 'das): du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang
133b6(myang 'das): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro//
133b7(myang 'das): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chun chang

152a5(myang 'das): bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnab par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu
152a6(myang 'das): ma mchis shing mi dmigs/ bdag med pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ byang chub
152a7(myang 'das): sems dpa' gzugs bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag yod

159a5(myang 'das): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a6(myang 'das): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
159a7(myang 'das): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'cha
159b1(myang 'das): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani yongs su rdzogs par brtsi bar 'tshal ba'i
159b2(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
159b3(myang 'das): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par brdzi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
159b4(myang 'das): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bca'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i bya
159b5(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar

159b7(myang 'das): par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa la
160a1(myang 'das): bslab par bgyi'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
160a2(myang 'das): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// byang/

161a3(myang 'das): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs

161b3(myang 'das): lus par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud bzhi'i dpung sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge

165b6(myang 'das): rlom sems su mi bya'o// ma rig pa shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su mi bya'o// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang /

166a1(myang 'das): mi bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'don 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu ldan pa dang /
166a2(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par byaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su pi bA'o// nang stong pa nyid shes par bya ste/ nang stong pa nyid des rlom sems su ma~M b+ha'o//
166a3(myang 'das): po med pa'i ngo bo tshad stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes par bya ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des rlob sems su mi bya'o// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa
166a4(myang 'das): snyoms par 'jug pa shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//
166a5(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa dum bu dang po/ bam po dgu pa// mig lnga shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar
166a6(myang 'das): gzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
166a7(myang 'das): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par byaste/ de dag gi rlom sems su mi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang
166b1(myang 'das): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / rmod
166b2(myang 'das): pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes par bya ste/ de dag gi rlom sems su mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
166b3(myang 'das): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o//
166b4(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o// mi mnyam/
166b5(myang 'das): pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o// rlabs po che'i sems kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te/ sems
166b6(myang 'das): kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems
166b7(myang 'das): gang 'dod chags dang yang mi ldan ma bral/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib pa dang / gcod pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / lta ba'i/
167a1(myang 'das): rnam pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang mi ldan ma bral ba 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
167a2(myang 'das): po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de yod dam rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
167a3(myang 'das): ti'i bu de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa 'amamed pa dmigs pa 'am/ yod par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
167a4(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa 'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de skad du sems gang la sems/

167a7(myang 'das): pa de tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/ de bzhin du/
167b1(myang 'das): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/ ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa/

180a1(myang 'das): kyi 'dus te gru pas spyod// migug 'das te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lcags pa sna pagag 'dus te reg pas lags/ mug gi 'dus

180a3(myang 'das): te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang
180a4(myang 'das): ljags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
180a5(myang 'das): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i stong pa
180a6(myang 'das): nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi
180a7(myang 'das): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang spong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / snga'i ras
180b1(myang 'das): hA/ blangs sa byung / sa /
180b2(myang 'das): 'dus 'ag pa'i rkyen gyim tshor pas s+ho/ yang sa 'dus dri dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i byung ba'i gang lags pa yang mi kyi 'dus rig pa'i na sa tsur
180b3(myang 'das): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor banyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'du
180b4(myang 'das): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams so'i khams kyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa'i khams ma lags/ sa'i khams las gung
180b5(myang 'das): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mapa'i
180b6(myang 'das): khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma

181a1(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma/
181a2(myang 'das): mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang/
181a3(myang 'das): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rga shis stong ste/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shim lags/ rga shi las

181b1(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das ma pa yo tu gyu pa la sa gyu na/ byu dang /
181b2(myang 'das): ma lugs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha ro

182a1(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/

194a3(myang 'das): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so//
194a4(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin
194a5(myang 'das): pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
194a6(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194a7(myang 'das): 'di ni gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
194b1(myang 'das): sa / [।] na ma pa skyems la sa smra
194b2(myang 'das): de nas tshe dang ldar pa shAr ngo'i bus me dang ldan par ba 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldar pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yid/ rab 'byor gyis rnas pa/
194b3(myang 'das): da dang/ pa da nga dang / pa'i bas/ nga/ da pa pa nga dang /
194b4(myang 'das): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba sang pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
194b5(myang 'das): thams cad stong pa nyid dang nga/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
194b6(myang 'das): nyid kyi phyirashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul zim
194b7(myang 'das): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
195a1(myang 'das): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
195a2(myang 'das): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
195a3(myang 'das): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
195a4(myang 'das): rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
195a5(myang 'das): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
195a6(myang 'das): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin spyong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
195a7(myang 'das): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
195b1(myang 'das): ti'i bu rang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing ming mig po/
195b2(myang 'das): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
195b3(myang 'das): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
195b4(myang 'das): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
195b5(myang 'das): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
195b6(myang 'das): dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir
195b7(myang 'das): de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
196a1(myang 'das): yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyud du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so//
196a2(myang 'das): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
196a3(myang 'das): nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// phyi na dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa
196a4(myang 'das): nyid cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa/
196a5(myang 'das): ti'i bre/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med//
196a6(myang 'das): cing yongs su zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//
196a7(myang 'das): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mabral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa
196b1(myang 'das): dadang ldar pashA dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chog yang rab pa jis pa
196b2(myang 'das): bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par shes pa ni
196b3(myang 'das): rngam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu nas so//
196b4(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
196b5(myang 'das): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu smin pa dang /
196b6(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni
196b7(myang 'das): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang
197a1(myang 'das): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
197a2(myang 'das): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
197a3(myang 'das): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
197a4(myang 'das): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang
197a5(myang 'das): bzhin dang bral ba/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
197a6(myang 'das): dang bral ba/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang
197a7(myang 'das): chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga yang
197b1(myang 'das): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma thal bar shes par bya'o/
197b2(myang 'das): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang /
197b3(myang 'das): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
197b4(myang 'das): med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ni
197b5(myang 'das): dngos po med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor
197b6(myang 'das): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang
197b7(myang 'das): bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par rig par
198a1(myang 'das): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bur/ gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la

198a3(myang 'das): par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do// yang dag pa'i mthu'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la
198a4(myang 'das): yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

198a6(myang 'das): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
198a7(myang 'das): rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byu
198b1(myang 'das): ba yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so//
198b2(myang 'das): yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
198b3(myang 'das): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /
198b4(myang 'das): ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs
198b5(myang 'das): su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi phred do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang
198b6(myang 'das): mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// de 'dod chags
198b7(myang 'das): kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / zag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang mchi
199a1(myang 'das): yang du rgyab sa gyur te/ khor thug ga par rdzug bar 'gyur ro/ sa ltu pan 'angs sa byung bya da dum phyogs pa smras ga sa pa /
199a2(myang 'das): 'gyur ro// de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi dang du 'gro ramatha med pa yangs
199a3(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du ga nam yang sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams dang thal bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas mtshe dang ldan pa gshar dwa ti dra/
199a4(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra/

199a6(myang 'das): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
199a7(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
199b1(myang 'das): khyod la ma pa ma rjod tshamapa pa // / 'du ga rna
199b2(myang 'das): spyong na mtshan ma la sdong ngo // gal te gzugs me rtag cem bgyi bar spyod na mtsham pa la spang ngo // tshor ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spong la
199b3(myang 'das): la spod ngo do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

199b5(myang 'das): gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// gal te gzugs
199b6(myang 'das): bdag med ces 'gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs na
199b7(myang 'das): nas bgyi bar spyong na mtshan pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshar ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa 'o zhes bgyi bar
200a1(myang 'das): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs dben zhes/
200a2(myang 'das): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar
200a3(myang 'das): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes par / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
200a4(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i tshe ga thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / sto

200a6(myang 'das): par 'jug pa dmas dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i spoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / song bshid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med badrung
200a7(myang 'das): pa shes pa rnam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs gyo zho rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs 'acu dang / mi 'jigs pa pa'i dang / ma ma yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang/
200b1(myang 'das): sa nga/ / rna nga / swA hA/ hA/ dU/ drug /
200b2(myang 'das): ma pa yar byung nam rnam la gyung ro// tsas yan 'das stsal te byung chub sems dpa' mam sa dpa ngan lags ma na pa la byung 'du/ 'di ma ba
200b3(myang 'das): kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la snang dezhes batho bar spyong nga/ dmigs pa la spyod paste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das ga sa chu
200b4(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// doni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma
200b5(myang 'das): nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
200b6(myang 'das): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa /
200b7(myang 'das): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos/
201a1(myang 'das): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang
201a2(myang 'das): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid ba bde ba dang / khrug pa las yongs su mi grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi grol bar brjod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes/
201a3(myang 'das): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba
201a4(myang 'das): la spyod do// don skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na dang / 'tsho ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi grol
201a5(myang 'das): sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi grol bar mdzad do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te
201a6(myang 'das): byin gyis rlob/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang
201a7(myang 'das): dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang
201b1(myang 'das): lnga'i rnab par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rjog/
201b2(myang 'das): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lnga'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lho'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlo mig gi 'dus
201b3(myang 'das): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten
201b4(myang 'das): gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
201b5(myang 'das): rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / med pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang

202a1(myang 'das): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /

205a1(myang 'das): par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rim chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/

207a4(myang 'das): ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par
207a5(myang 'das): sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
207a6(myang 'das): 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
207a7(myang 'das): glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid
207b1(myang 'das): ci'abya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod ngo do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 'on mongs pa med par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'odang du 'dzi
207b2(myang 'das): rgya mongs pa dang bzlas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gsol bya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas dmigs su meng pa la 'dron pa sa rgyu ba'i da
207b3(myang 'das): longango // de baman cid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin song ngo // zas kyi ston yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dong de 'don yod do// gtsu
207b4(myang 'das): rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i tha/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes
207b5(myang 'das): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
207b6(myang 'das): 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
207b7(myang 'das): dpa' chen po rnams ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas
208a1(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad
208a2(myang 'das): sed grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
208a3(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gi rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang
208a4(myang 'das): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
208a5(myang 'das): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/ des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
208a6(myang 'das): bdag ni snyoms par zhugs po zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlob sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdas ni
208a7(myang 'das): mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/ zhes chos sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang
208b1(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dang / rab 'byor gyis smras pa
208b2(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems
208b3(myang 'das): dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
208b4(myang 'das): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang
208b5(myang 'das): gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan
208b6(myang 'das): par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam
208b7(myang 'das): rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// sbas pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i
209a1(myang 'das): phyir ro// smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin dul
209a2(myang 'das): rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ rig kyis bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa/ ci'i
209a3(myang 'das): phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang
209a4(myang 'das): med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa med do// 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs
209a5(myang 'das): so legs so// tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin
209a6(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
209a7(myang 'das): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyid pa dang / sbyor pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang
209b1(myang 'das): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i busabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/
209b2(myang 'das): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bsam gtan
209b3(myang 'das): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
209b4(myang 'das): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bcom ldan 'das
209b5(myang 'das): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam
209b6(myang 'das): gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
209b7(myang 'das): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus
210a1(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag/
210a2(myang 'das): mi dmigs so// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / she bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang // /
210a3(myang 'das): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam
210a4(myang 'das): bar dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i kham/
210a5(myang 'das): mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag
210a6(myang 'das): pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
210a7(myang 'das): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa/
210b1(myang 'das): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
210b2(myang 'das): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin
210b3(myang 'das): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//
210b4(myang 'das): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//
210b5(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
210b6(myang 'das): rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems
210b7(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
211a1(myang 'das): chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na//
211a2(myang 'das): chos gang la yang slob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no//
211a3(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ dethar yod/
211a4(myang 'das): pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
211a5(myang 'das): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
211a6(myang 'das): shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med/
211a7(myang 'das): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir
211b1(myang 'das): yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas srid pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa la yongs su brtag pas med pa la mngon par
211b2(myang 'das): zhen cing 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par
211b3(myang 'das): zhen pa de dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas
211b4(myang 'das): yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes
211b5(myang 'das): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
211b6(myang 'das): chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag
211b7(myang 'das): 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba
212a1(myang 'das): ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches shes na/ gzugs gzugs
212a2(myang 'das): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/
212a3(myang 'das): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
212a4(myang 'das): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas
212a5(myang 'das): pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
212a6(myang 'das): rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / lnga dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mchod dang
212a7(myang 'das): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon/
212b1(myang 'das): par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ngor phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
212b2(myang 'das): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags samabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA dwa ti'i bur
212b3(myang 'das): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa
212b4(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das ci'i srad du/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags bcom ldan
212b5(myang 'das): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zabs mi mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par
212b6(myang 'das): rten bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i ba
212b7(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
213a1(myang 'das): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing
213a2(myang 'das): mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
213a3(myang 'das): ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
213a4(myang 'das): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
213a5(myang 'das): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par
213a6(myang 'das): zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
213a7(myang 'das): pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis
213b1(myang 'das): slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / shA ra dwa ti'i bunam byang chub sems dpa'
213b2(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong dang shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
213b3(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
213b4(myang 'das): byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
213b5(myang 'das): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs
213b6(myang 'das): yang dag par rjes su mi mtho zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
213b7(myang 'das): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab
214a1(myang 'das): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmig/
214a2(myang 'das): ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
214a3(myang 'das): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u
214a4(myang 'das): drug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu
214a5(myang 'das): ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/
214a6(myang 'das): zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
214a7(myang 'das): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
214b1(myang 'das): ci slu ba'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bsgrubs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi
214b2(myang 'das): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin
214b3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris khyod nyid kyis
214b4(myang 'das): ltar bzod pa de ltar lung rton cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
214b5(myang 'das): byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin sA ba mam gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
214b6(myang 'das): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la
214b7(myang 'das): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
215a1(myang 'das): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan pa/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam pa/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sgra'i rnam
215a2(myang 'das): par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi
215a3(myang 'das): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
215a4(myang 'das): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yon snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rdzu la yang gzhan zhig yin/
215a5(myang 'das): sAmA ma ma/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
215a6(myang 'das): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mamagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
215a7(myang 'das): song/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mas
215b1(myang 'das): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de sa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
215b2(myang 'das): bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mA ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du/

215b5(myang 'das): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags teg rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags

216a1(myang 'das): kyang zlu ma/ sgyum nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ rdzu ma yang gan/
