250b6(myang 'das): sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
250b7(myang 'das): don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gidon gang yin pa'i chos de dag
251a1(myang 'das): thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa dang / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa
251a2(myang 'das): mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
251a3(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
251a4(myang 'das): dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
251a5(myang 'das): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
251a6(myang 'das): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang gathun mong
251a7(myang 'das): ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
251b1(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos
251b2(myang 'das): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa
251b3(myang 'das): rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod rnams kyi
251b4(myang 'das): las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes
251b5(myang 'das): dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
251b6(myang 'das): rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
251b7(myang 'das): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun
252a1(myang 'das): rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang //
252a2(myang 'das): lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig
252a3(myang 'das): rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
252a4(myang 'das): mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra mA dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / chags sems dang /
252a5(myang 'das): gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'chog pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rdul dang /
252a6(myang 'das): log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
252a7(myang 'das): rtsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhini lung ma bstan pa'o// dbang po/
252b1(myang 'das): lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma
252b2(myang 'das): bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
252b3(myang 'das): pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi
252b4(myang 'das): lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang ka tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos//
252b5(myang 'das): ma gtogs par/ de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji skyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
252b6(myang 'das): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
252b7(myang 'das): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
253a1(myang 'das): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes bya/
253a2(myang 'das): rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i te/
253a3(myang 'das): nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas
253a4(myang 'das): gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par
253a5(myang 'das): mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing ba sna tshogs kyi 'dra/
253a6(myang 'das): shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de nam
253a7(myang 'das): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
253b1(myang 'das): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pan
253b2(myang 'das): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med
253b3(myang 'das): 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang
253b4(myang 'das): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tsher ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis
253b5(myang 'das): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben thig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas
253b6(myang 'das): pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su
253b7(myang 'das): dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med la rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar
254a1(myang 'das): bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis//
254a2(myang 'das): myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
254a3(myang 'das): bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ zug bsngal ba yang
254a4(myang 'das): med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das
254a5(myang 'das): ten thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' mas bye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
254a6(myang 'das): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye
254a7(myang 'das): mche la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung bzad med pa'i
254b1(myang 'das): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar/
254b2(myang 'das): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min sgo mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
254b3(myang 'das): gnas so// de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med po'i ngo bo
254b4(myang 'das): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
254b5(myang 'das): bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
254b6(myang 'das): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med
254b7(myang 'das): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom
255a1(myang 'das): ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya ba ni
255a2(myang 'das): dran pa nye brwa gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
255a3(myang 'das): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
255a4(myang 'das): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
255a5(myang 'das): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste
255a6(myang 'das): de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'du
255a7(myang 'das): byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i
255b1(myang 'das): chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gso/
255b2(myang 'das): padra bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med cing
255b3(myang 'das): 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
255b4(myang 'das): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid / chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus
255b5(myang 'das): ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos shes bya ba
255b6(myang 'das): ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye
255b7(myang 'das): rnams dang thun mong gi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mo/
256a1(myang 'das): ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag/
256a2(myang 'das): ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
256a3(myang 'das): thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong
256a4(myang 'das): du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'od byang chub sems dpa'
256a5(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi
256a6(myang 'das): phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung
256a7(myang 'das): po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
256b1(myang 'das): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs papa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong /
256b2(myang 'das): ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang
256b3(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta
256b4(myang 'das): bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o//
256b5(myang 'das): gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
256b6(myang 'das): chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpab tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang
256b7(myang 'das): bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las brla
257a1(myang 'das): bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos/
257a2(myang 'das): thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
257a3(myang 'das): la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du
257a4(myang 'das): chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrubs par bslabs par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
257a5(myang 'das): dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed ba rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i bul mi dmigs pa'i tshul
257a6(myang 'das): gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi ste gnas pa dang /
257a7(myang 'das): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji skad cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad de dag gi don du bdag gis
257b1(myang 'das): nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyeng bar bya ste/ bdag gis sems can
257b2(myang 'das): rore'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi
257b3(myang 'das): bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes/ thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can thams
257b4(myang 'das): cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams
257b5(myang 'das): su myong bar bya'o// de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags nas/ bla na med
257b6(myang 'das): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs paro 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
257b7(myang 'das): dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i
258a1(myang 'das): tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can
258a2(myang 'das): thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed byin/
258a3(myang 'das): chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
258a4(myang 'das): kyang mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems
258a5(myang 'das): su mi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o sem
258a6(myang 'das): mi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi srul
258a7(myang 'das): ba'o// sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams
258b1(myang 'das): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems
258b2(myang 'das): can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/
258b3(myang 'das): la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
258b4(myang 'das): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar 'gyur ro// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/
258b5(myang 'das): chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang de la chos 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga'
258b6(myang 'das): ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos
258b7(myang 'das): la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes
259a1(myang 'das): bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i//
259a2(myang 'das): phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa
259a3(myang 'das): nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur
259a4(myang 'das): bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags
259a5(myang 'das): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis
259a6(myang 'das): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
259a7(myang 'das): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
259b1(myang 'das): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
259b2(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'o ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par
259b3(myang 'das): grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor rlos de
259b4(myang 'das): ngag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas de'i phyir
259b5(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
259b6(myang 'das): 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i
259b7(myang 'das): bu de la spobs pa skyed cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso
260a1(myang 'das): dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang //
260a2(myang 'das): rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang
260a3(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas
260a4(myang 'das): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba
260a5(myang 'das): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub
260a6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
260a7(myang 'das): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
260b1(myang 'das): shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260b2(myang 'das): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra
260b3(myang 'das): byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar dmigs shing dmigs
260b4(myang 'das): bya'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa che bar gnag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / glu phru
260b5(myang 'das): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
260b6(myang 'das): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rnam
260b7(myang 'das): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting
261a1(myang 'das): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang
261a2(myang 'das): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
261a3(myang 'das): gyi lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
261a4(myang 'das): shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
261a5(myang 'das): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
261a6(myang 'das): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pargya'o//
261a7(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam po dang ma
261b1(myang 'das): pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems//
261b2(myang 'das): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems don zag pa ma mchis shing / khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams
261b3(myang 'das): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas//
261b4(myang 'das): de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces gsol
261b5(myang 'das): to// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin
261b6(myang 'das): pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang
261b7(myang 'das): skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang
262a1(myang 'das): dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grub pa med pa dang
262a2(myang 'das): ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyon thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// byang chub sems/
262a3(myang 'das): dpa'i sems med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi
262a4(myang 'das): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad
262a5(myang 'das): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med de zhes smras pa ni de ltar yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas na gzugs
262a6(myang 'das): kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags par 'gyur ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa
262a7(myang 'das): med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin to// gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa
262b1(myang 'das): med ngo do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do// sangs
262b2(myang 'das): rgyurgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod
262b3(myang 'das): kyis 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad
262b4(myang 'das): de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs
262b5(myang 'das): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
262b6(myang 'das): dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin
262b7(myang 'das): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa mang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing yongs su chud pa med do//
263a1(myang 'das): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang //
263a2(myang 'das): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa
263a3(myang 'das): nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor/
263a4(myang 'das): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
263a5(myang 'das): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pakyi
263a6(myang 'das): kyi phyir zag pa med ci khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa
263a7(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma
263b1(myang 'das): zad de/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la
263b2(myang 'das): chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar
263b3(myang 'das): du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa
263b4(myang 'das): med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang /
263b5(myang 'das): rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la tshogs pa med de//
263b6(myang 'das): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang /
263b7(myang 'das): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang
264a1(myang 'das): chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la
264a2(myang 'das): dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//
264a3(myang 'das): nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi zas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi sang du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// na
264a4(myang 'das): zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po
264a5(myang 'das): bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das doni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems
264a6(myang 'das): can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bul 'di skad ces smras so//
264a7(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
264b1(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don/
264b2(myang 'das): du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/
264b3(myang 'das): sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
264b4(myang 'das): bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
264b5(myang 'das): phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung
264b6(myang 'das): zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
264b7(myang 'das): bsam gtan skyed do// sems can cung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol
265a1(myang 'das): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di skad cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i/
265a2(myang 'das): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ bsems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o//
265a3(myang 'das): 'am/ sems can 'di skad cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams
265a4(myang 'das): cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
265a5(myang 'das): la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
265a6(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chu
265a7(myang 'das): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa rnams la gnas par
265b1(myang 'das): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zung /
265b2(myang 'das): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshes sa pa'i stobs bcu dang /
265b3(myang 'das): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can
265b4(myang 'das): thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
265b5(myang 'das): go ma chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i pra/
265b6(myang 'das): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyad dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs
265b7(myang 'das): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
266a1(myang 'das): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su b+h+yo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha
266a2(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong
266a3(myang 'das): zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi sngo ba 'dri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba
266a4(myang 'das): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
266a5(myang 'das): chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
266a6(myang 'das): byin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la
266a7(myang 'das): bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
266b1(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
266b2(myang 'das): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byung
266b3(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
266b4(myang 'das): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/
266b5(myang 'das): yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub
266b6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bun pa
266b7(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa de'i tshe//
267a1(myang 'das): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang lda/
267a2(myang 'das): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs/
267a3(myang 'das): sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su slob
267a4(myang 'das): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa'i shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
267a5(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos
267a6(myang 'das): pami skyed na/ so so'i skye bo sa la sku smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
267a7(myang 'das): tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha
267b1(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod
267b2(myang 'das): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims
267b3(myang 'das): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
267b4(myang 'das): tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
267b5(myang 'das): pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267b6(myang 'das): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
267b7(myang 'das): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
268a1(myang 'das): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de
268a2(myang 'das): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
268a3(myang 'das): tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
268a4(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o//
268a5(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas
268a6(myang 'das): ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
268a7(myang 'das): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
268b1(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsam
268b2(myang 'das): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ blun ma
268b3(myang 'das): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su rdzo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
268b4(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
268b5(myang 'das): bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
268b6(myang 'das): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
268b7(myang 'das): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
269a1(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang
269a2(myang 'das): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yon gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa
269a3(myang 'das): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
269a4(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha
269a5(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang
269a6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
269a7(myang 'das): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// de'i phyir gocha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shAr rA
269b1(myang 'das): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pa yin gyi// rnam pa/
269b2(myang 'das): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog/
269b3(myang 'das): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
269b4(myang 'das): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa tham
269b5(myang 'das): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
269b6(myang 'das): yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
269b7(myang 'das): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson//
270a1(myang 'das): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
270a2(myang 'das): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas//
270a3(myang 'das): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du
270a4(myang 'das): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing brtun mi nges pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
270a5(myang 'das): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
270a6(myang 'das): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha
270a7(myang 'das): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
270b1(myang 'das): thams dad ma khyen pa'ad dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad snga mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlos sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de/
270b2(myang 'das): yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'drin/ byang chub sems
270b3(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
270b4(myang 'das): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
270b5(myang 'das): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
270b6(myang 'das): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ning / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams can dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
270b7(myang 'das): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang /
271a1(myang 'das): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
271a2(myang 'das): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong
271a3(myang 'das): du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
271a4(myang 'das): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas/
271a5(myang 'das): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
271a6(myang 'das): dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
271a7(myang 'das): skyed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya
271b1(myang 'das): bas pa yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba de
271b2(myang 'das): yang sems can thams cad dang thun meng du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bo 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
271b3(myang 'das): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
271b4(myang 'das): la spyod cing gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
271b5(myang 'das): pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sde ba
271b6(myang 'das): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byung
271b7(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom
272a1(myang 'das): sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag
272a2(myang 'das): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
272a3(myang 'das): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po
272a4(myang 'das): bgos shes bya/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rlang sangs
272a5(myang 'das): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing // dag pa'i rngab
272a6(myang 'das): sebs can rnams ca dang thun mong du byas shing / bran mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su su pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' snams dpa 'dzin po shes rab kyi
272a7(myang 'das): phyi pa ma thong ba rji 'i ma mi phyin pa'o// mang ldan pa 'i thig 'an sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa srin thogs pakyil ga phyin pa la spyo /
272b1(myang 'das): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa de yang sems /
272b2(myang 'das): thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
272b3(myang 'das): pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
272b4(myang 'das): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te
272b5(myang 'das): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'ad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
272b6(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
272b7(myang 'das): la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing //
273a1(myang 'das): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
273a2(myang 'das): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
273a3(myang 'das): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// sems
273a4(myang 'das): rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa bo de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
273a5(myang 'das): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a6(myang 'das): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes che bar gnas te/ nyan thos dpe rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
273a7(myang 'das): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlob sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
273b1(myang 'das): shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab tu/
273b2(myang 'das): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nAm byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang /
273b3(myang 'das): sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen
273b4(myang 'das): po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing // pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
273b5(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
273b6(myang 'das): la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
273b7(myang 'das): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o//
274a1(myang 'das): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs la mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o//
274a2(myang 'das): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs mod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong
274a3(myang 'das): pab dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan tho/
274a4(myang 'das): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
274a5(myang 'das): mkhas pa'i ge cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
274a6(myang 'das): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar ko na chen po bgos pa la shwar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lde nub dang / nub byang dang
274a7(myang 'das): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa chad du brjod cing /
274b1(myang 'das): ming yongs su klog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par/
274b2(myang 'das): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
274b3(myang 'das): gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/
274b4(myang 'das): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la smod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas
274b5(myang 'das): dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
274b6(myang 'das): de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/
274b7(myang 'das): gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs
275a1(myang 'das): bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems r+b+ba
275a2(myang 'das): chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
275a3(myang 'das): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkhan
275a4(myang 'das): rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhag cing ga rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275a5(myang 'das): blo'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gta
275a6(myang 'das): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa

275b2(myang 'das): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang stems par byas shing rnam par spyod do// snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa

275b5(myang 'das): pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrub
275b6(myang 'das): te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrub

276a1(myang 'das): chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing

276b3(myang 'das): nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

276b6(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa/

280b4(myang 'das): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du domi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
